alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hidalgo County through 430 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Cloverdale, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloverdale, Camp Garza and Animas Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
